docs.snippet: Award-winning American singer and songwriter John Legend took to the stage in Bahrain on Monday night, performing to a sold-out crowd of more than 2,000 people despite calls by some activists to cancel the concert due to concerns over human rights...
docs.lead_paragraph: Award-winning American singer and songwriter John Legend took to the stage in Bahrain on Monday night, performing to a sold-out crowd of more than 2,000 people despite calls by some activists to cancel the concert due to concerns over human rights abuses in the Gulf Arab nation.

docs.snippet: It's taken 15 years for the Nasdaq composite index to approach the record high of 5,048 it reached back in March 2000, at the height of the tech-stock boom that would later collapse. On Monday the index closed above 5,000 points for the first time...
docs.lead_paragraph: It's taken 15 years for the Nasdaq composite index to approach the record high of 5,048 it reached back in March 2000, at the height of the tech-stock boom that would later collapse. On Monday the index closed above 5,000 points for the first time since hitting its peak. Here are some things that have changed since then, in the index and in the U.S.

headline.main: The Nasdaq Composite Index, Then and Now
headline.print_headline: The Nasdaq Composite Index, Then and Now

docs.snippet: The last time the Nasdaq was this high, Bill Clinton was president, your Internet connection was probably still dial-up and the iPod, iPhone and iPad didn't exist....

headline.main: Dot-Com Deja Vu: Nasdaq Tops 5,000, Approaching Record High
